title: Get
content:
- Sent:
```
curl https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users
```
- Received:
```
[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "name": "Leanne Graham",
    "username": "Bret",
    "email": "Sincere@april.biz"
  },
  {
    "id": 2,
    "name": "Ervin Howell",
    "username": "Antonette",
    "email": "Shanna@melissa.tv"
  }
]
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users -H "Authorization: token"
```

title: Post
content:
- Sent:
```
curl -X POST https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users -d 'name=Example&age=30'
```
- Received:
```
{"message": "Data added successfully"}
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl -X POST \
    https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users \
    -H 'Authorization: token' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"name": "Example", "age": 30}'
```

title: Put
content:
- Sent:
```
curl -X PUT https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users -d 'name=Example&age=30'
```
- Received:
```
{"message": "Data updated successfully"}
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl -X PUT \
    https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users \
    -H 'Authorization: token' \
    -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
    -d '{"name": "Example", "age": 30}'
```

title: Delete
content:
- Sent:
```
curl -X DELETE https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/1
```
- Received:
```
{"message": "Data deleted successfully"}
```
- Obs.: sent with header:
```
curl -X DELETE https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/users/1 -H "Authorization: token"
```

title: Install
content:
Para instalar a libcurl com suporte a OpenSSL 3 no Linux Mint, siga estes passos:

- 1. Primeiro, atualize seu sistema:
```
sudo apt update
sudo apt upgrade
```
- 2. Instale as dependências necessárias:
```
sudo apt install build-essential libssl-dev libpsl-dev
```
- 3. Baixe a versão mais recente do libcurl (ou a versão específica que você precisa) do site oficial:
```
wget https://curl.se/download/curl-8.6.0.tar.gz
```
- 4. Extraia o arquivo:
```
tar -xzvf curl-8.6.0.tar.gz
```
- 5. Entre no diretório extraído:
```
cd curl-8.6.0
```
- 6. Configure a compilação com suporte a OpenSSL 3:
```
./configure --with-openssl
```
- 7. Compile o código:
```
make
```
- 8. Instale o libcurl compilado:
```
sudo make install
```
- 9. Atualize o cache da biblioteca dinâmica:
```
sudo ldconfig
```
- 10. Adicione essa linha ao seu arquivo .bashrc para torná-la permanente:
```
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/local/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
```
